name: PinOut!
summary:
PinOut (sometimes stylized as PinOut!) is a pinball video game developed by the Swedish indie game studio Mediocre. It was released om October 2016 for Android and iOS. The goal of the game is propel a ball as far as possible before time runs out.

简介来自英文维基百科：https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PinOut
info:
• 平台: iOS
  • 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: Pinball
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2016年10月27日
  • 售价: 免费
  • 官方网站: https://www.mediocre.se/pinout/
  • 开发: Mediocre AB
